source: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_SEQ_00<tab>Lucinne is in need of an extra pair of hands.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_SEQ_00<tab>カストルム・オリエンスのルシヌ准牙士は、再び冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_TODO_00<tab>Obtain soil samples from the Comet's Tail.
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_TODO_01<tab>Obtain a water sample from the Comet's Tail.

target: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_TODO_02<tab>ルシヌ准牙士に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DA001 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DA101 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_000<tab>Oh, you're the adventurer from before. Have you come for more work? Because I could certainly do with an extra hand or two.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_000あ、この前の冒険者さん。
ちょうど、いいところに来てくれました。
また、私のお願いを聞いていただけませんか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_001<tab>My analysis of the samples you brought me is coming along quite nicely, but there is one more area I would have you investigate.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_001以前採ってきていただいたサンプルは、
現在、分析を進めているところです。
それとは別に、新たに調査を行いたい場所がありまして……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_002<tab>There's a cavern southeast of here, the Comet's Tail, so named for the glowing ore covering its walls and ceiling, as if the gods themselves captured starlight and placed it there.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_002ここから南東に、「流星の尾」と呼ばれる洞窟があります。
壁や天井を、輝く鉱石が覆い尽くす窟内は大変美しく、
まるで、星の瞬く夜空を閉じ込めたようだと、伝えられています。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_003<tab>Despite its supposed beauty, however, I have heard reports that the area has been adversely affected by pollution. As before I need you to procure three samples of the soil and one of the water so I can ascertain the truth of what has happened there.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_003しかし、その内部が汚染されているという噂があるのです。
その調査のため、「」を3つと、
「」を1つ、採ってきていただけませんか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_004<tab>Whatever damage has been done to that cavern, I pray it is not irreversible. I will require samples of both the soil and water there to be certain.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_004ここから南東に、「流星の尾」と呼ばれる洞窟があります。
調査のため、「」を3つと、「」を1つ、
採ってきていただけませんか。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_010<tab>Did you have trouble procuring the samples?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_010<tab>サンプルは、採ってきていただけましたか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_011<tab>Yes, this is perfect. Perhaps someday soon we can restore the cave to what it once was.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_011ありがとうございます。
これで、分析が進められます。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_012<tab>You see, the Comet's Tail was once a place of worship. Legend has it that, as the great flood of the Sixth Umbral Calamity swept across Eorzea, Rhalgr cast a great beacon into the sky to lead His people to safety. That beacon would one day fall to earth, and its remains are what illuminate that cave.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_012そういえば……あの洞窟には、次のような逸話があるんですよ。
流星の尾は、第六霊災の際に人々を大洪水から救った、導きの星。
壊神ラールガーが民を導くために放った、彗星の軌跡である……と。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_013<tab>The Ala Mhigans placed altars within, and would often visit to offer up prayers to Rhalgr. Of course, that all changed when the Garleans came...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_013神を奉る地として、アラミゴ人は内部に祭壇を設け、
供物を捧げ、大切にしてきたそうです。
しかし、帝国軍は祭壇を撤去し、立ち入り禁止を徹底しました。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_014<tab>No one is certain for what purpose the cave was closed off, but some say it was used as a crude weapons research facility.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_014信仰が心の拠り所となることを、恐れたためでしょう。
しかし、別の狙いがあるのではないか、と考える者もいました。
内部で、兵器の実験が行われていた、という……噂です。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_015<tab>Whatever the truth may be, I will find it, and restore what was taken from the Ala Mhigans.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_015この噂の真相を確かめ、必要とあらば汚染を取り除き、
かつてのような素朴な信仰の場へと戻す……。
そのためにも調査を進めたいと思います。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_016<tab>When that day comes, I hope you'll go and pay the Comet's Tail a visit.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ110_02660_LUCINNE_000_016ありがとうございました……冒険者さん。
度重なる協力に感謝します！
